document_data.name: ''Book of Thoth''
document_data.author: [[Thoth]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''book of Thoth''''' was [[tome]] written by an incarnation of [[Thoth]], the scribe and historian of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Description: This large tome was bound in [[leather]]. It was fixed with a lock shaped like a [[baboon]]'s head.
document_data.Powers:
The ''book of Thoth'' could mimic the ''[[legend lore]]'' [[spell]] once per day on any item placed upon its cover. The book would open to a page that revealed the applicable information about the item, closing and locking itself only after the entry was read.

If the book was forced open by any means all that would be found would be blank pages and the book's [[magic]] would be lost forever.
